sentences.en: " Couldn't help it,'said the drummer, " I've been busy. "
sentences.cn: “ 实在没办法, "推销员说, “ 我一直很忙.

sentences.en: " I think I've done a good deal ,'said the drummer, looking around.
sentences.cn: “ 我看我做的不算少了."推销员说着看了看四周.

sentences.en: " Well, " he said , looking the drummer over, " rosy as ever, eh? "
sentences.cn: “ 嘿, " 他打量着推销员说, " 气色和往常一样好, 是吧?

sentences.en: " You want to send her her part? " asked the drummer.
sentences.cn: “ 你是要给她送台词去吧,"推销员说.

sentences.en: A stand-in drummer bashes on a single snare and a pair of cymbals.
sentences.cn: 一名临时顶替的鼓手使劲敲着一根响弦和一对铙钹。

sentences.en: Carrie revived a little under the drummer's electrical , nervous condition.
sentences.cn: 推销员富有感染力的活跃情绪使嘉莉振作了一些.

sentences.en: He was a drummer in a rock band.
sentences.cn: 他是一支摇滚乐队的鼓手。

sentences.en: He would not wait another day. The drummer should not have her.
sentences.cn: 他一天也不愿意再等了,不能让这个推销员拥有她.

sentences.en: Our drummer, Charlie, was our next - door neighbor.
sentences.cn: 我们的鼓手, 查里, 是我们的隔壁邻居.

sentences.en: She felt that the drummer had injured her irreparably.
sentences.cn: 她感到杜洛埃已经给她造成了无法弥补的伤害.

sentences.en: She was grateful for the drummer's presence, though.
sentences.cn: 不过她对推销员的来到很感激.

sentences.en: The drummer kept a strict eye upon the door.
sentences.cn: 推销员的眼睛开始紧紧地盯着那扇门.

sentences.en: The drummer pinched his lip nervously.
sentences.cn: 推销员神经质地捏着嘴唇.

sentences.en: The drummer was feeling the shadow of something which was coming.
sentences.cn: 推销员感到了要发生什么事的阴影.

sentences.en: The school band needs a drummer.
sentences.cn: 学校乐队需要一名鼓手.

trans.tran_cn: 鼓手，〈美口〉旅行推销员，跑街
